dublinCore.dc:title: 119 HR 2597 IH: Protecting American Taxpayers from Wasteful Spending Act
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mrs. Hinson introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Oversight and Government Reform

form.official-title: To codify Executive Order 14249 (relating to protecting America’s bank account against fraud, waste, and abuse).

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Protecting American Taxpayers from Wasteful Spending Act.

section.header: Codification of Executive Order 14249, relating to protecting America’s bank account against fraud, waste, and abuse
section.text: Executive Order 14249 (90 Fed. Reg. 14011; relating to protecting America’s bank account against fraud, waste, and abuse, signed March 25, 2025), shall have the force and effect of law.
